titles.title: The Farmhouse-to-Workforce Housing Act of 2024
The Farmhouse-to-Workforce Housing Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Housing Act of 1949 to permit certain grants to be used for accessory dwelling units, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
